review: the Apple TV is great but was very obviously not new. It had previously been used as someone elses Apple Account Info was on it!! As this was a gift this was doubly upsetting and embarrassing. Luckily she is a really close friend and did not make too big of a deal out of it. Also, the remote was missing which made it pretty much impossible to set up, as even with the iphone remote app you still need a remote to get it activated initially!! Thank god I have an Android and so different version of the app which worked and enabled us to get her remote and AppleTV up and going  . Amazon was super helpful and fast once I contacted them about getting a remote out though no apology for selling a previously used item as new. Had they not been so helpful and fast in there response they would only get 1 star.
